newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistani stocks end up on GDR-linked scrips.
newsitem.headline: Pakistani stocks end up on GDR-linked scrips.

text.p: Pakistani stocks ended 1.36 percent up on Thursday as the rally in Global Depositary Receipt-linked scrips continued and dealers said they expected the index to rise further in the near term.

"The rise in GDR-linked scrips of PTCL and Hub Power dominated sentiment," dealer Sajad Mankani said. "A technical correction is now due. But this rally is likely to continue for another one or two sessions."
The Karachi 100-share index rose 19.89 to end at 1,452.81 amid 130 gainers and 74 losers. PTCL rose 2.0 rupees to 29.60 and Hub Power 1.20 to 36.90. -- Amir Zia 9221-5685192
